main: ^After defeating the Keeper, John found his daughter in the same abyss where the battle had taken place. The Keeper's forces had infected her with an unknown disease, and she was unconscious. John set out to find a cure.
^Travelling across worlds was made more difficult by the imbalance of the world, but John vowed not to give up and to find a cure for his daughter.
^His arduous journey had only just begun....
